result.execSummary:
The defendant Paul Wayne Krueger was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Paul Wayne Krueger is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Paul Wayne Krueger was found guilty of Aggravated Battery-Intend GreatBod. Harm, a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(5).
  • Paul Wayne Krueger was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: - $250.00 DNA surcharge to be paid to the Department of Corrections.
- May not possess or use firearms or body armor.

- Not to have contact with Jeremy Blouin or 252 South Cascade Street, Osceola, Wisconsin.
- Absolute Sobriety.
- May not vote or hold public office until civil rights are restored.  Other civil rights may be lost until restored.    
- If not a U.S. Citizen, may face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.
- Must complete an AODA assessment & comply with recommendations.

**$43,605.54 Restitution to be paid to the Department of Corrections for disbursement to victim.**
***Additional Restitution ordered on 1/4/2018 in the amount of $40,000.00, for a total amount of $83,605.54, to be paid to the Department of Corrections.  Court finds ability to pay during period of Extended Supervision at no greater than $10,000.00.***

Sentence:  

Count 2 - 9 years WSP, 4 yr IC, 5 yr ES.  264 days credit.  DNA sample, $250 surcharge. No contact with Jeremy Blouin or 252 South Cascade Street, Osceola, WI.  AODA assmt&compliance and absolute sobriety. 

Count 5 - w/h, probation up to 3 years, consec.

No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, other civil rights may be lost until restored, no body armor, if not US citizen face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.
